Headline: #26 South Shore Express Temporary Northbound Reroute near 106th/Muskegon
ShortDescription: NB 26 South Shore Exp. buses are rerouted via: 106th, Muskegon, Commercial, 100th, and Ewing due to, street blockage near 106th/Muskegon.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #26 South Shore Exp. buses are rerouted via: 106th, Muskegon, Commercial, 100th, and Ewing due to, street blockage near 106th/Muskegon.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
